phrs.translation: 两脚架, 双脚架, 安装用人字架, 两脚台
双脚桅, 人字桅, 双柱桅杆

sentences.sentence: Just sleep time is bipod and approach, head on top.
sentences.translation: 刚睡的时候是两脚并拢，头趴在上面。

sentences.sentence: This one has a small bipod at the front to steady the weapon when fired.
sentences.translation: 前方的一对小型支架可以保持武器发射的稳定性。

sentences.sentence: Bipod stands apart apart is the same as humeral ministry wide the right hand is raised up.
sentences.translation: 两脚分开站立，相距同肩部宽，右手抬起向上。
